title: DDFP 274: Can Seahawks repeat?
itunes:title: DDFP 274: Can Seahawks repeat?
description:
Shek is joined in studio by Super Bowl champion Michael Robinson (and his ring) to discuss Pete Carroll's coaching style, NFL training camps and the Seattle Seahawks' chances of back-to-back titles. Then, Drew Christensen of NFL Media's research group debuts to discuss Jimmy Graham's new deal and provide some mind-blowing Hall of Fame stats. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
